page.title: 15Keswick's convention
page.content: The convention started in 1875 which is 110 years ago.It is about God and what he is saying.Two people started the convention.They were the vicar of St Johns Harford Battersby and Robert Wilson from Cockermouth.They did this because people wanted to know about Jesus.At the moment Mr Hedger is the record keeper.He keeps records.People ask him where they can stay and he can tell them. Over 8-9000 people come to the convention each year.These people who come,come because they want to learn more about Jesus Christ.The convention takes place once a year in each country.A certain amount of ground is left spare for the convention tents.The books and things they sell are all about Jesus Christ.
